                       java.io.InputStream is,
                       java.lang.String fileName,
                       RecipeHandler recipeHandler)
        Make a new loader for the given file.
        Parameters:
        mod - The mod.
        is - The stream containing xml recipes.
        fileName - The file name, used for debugging.

              throws XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException
        Validate the xml file.
        Throws:

      • loadRecipes

        public void loadRecipes(boolean crashOnInvalidRecipe)
                 throws XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException
        Load the recipes for this instance.
        Parameters:
        crashOnInvalidRecipe - If the loader should crash when an invalid recipe has been found. Will skip recipe otherwise.
        Throws:
        XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException - If something went wrong.
